title: Coordinator, Talent Acquisition
content:
Coordinator, Talent Acquisition (up to 12 month temporary assignment) 
At MLB the Talent Acquisition team is committed to attracting, developing and retaining a top-talented and diverse workforce. We are looking for a Coordinator to join our team to assist with interview scheduling, administration, event coordination and special projects.
Major Responsibilities:

Assist with all aspects of scheduling candidate interviews (in-person, phone, technical assessments and video)
Coordinate room-booking, team pre and post briefs, enter visitors to building system
Handle all communications with candidates before and after interviews as needed
Track candidates accordingly in Applicant Tracking System (Greenhouse) and assist in generating offer letters
Assist in making travel arrangements and expenses for candidates
Assist in requesting background checks to be sent to candidates
Organize and coordinate career fairs, college and partnership visits on-site

Requirements:

Minimum of one-year administrative experience
Proficient at using Microsoft Outlook, Word and Excel
Experience using ATS systems, preferably Greenhouse
Needs to be extremely organized and work in a fast-paced environment
Must have strong communications skills
Ability to juggle numerous scheduling tasks at once
Ability to exercise effective judgment, sensitivity, and creativity to changing needs and situations
Bachelor’s degree in Human Resources or related field preferred

Per the NYC pay transparency law, the hiring range for this position is an hourly rate of $25.00 to $28.00. The actual offer will carefully consider a wide range of factors, including your work experience, education, skills and any other factors Major League Baseball (MLB) considers relevant to the hiring decision.California Residents: Have you reviewed our California Consumer Privacy Act Policy ?
